JFP: Javascript Function Processor

  • Array
  • Conditional
  • Conversion
  • Core
  • Math
  • Object
  • Predicate

##Conversion Functions

toDec

  • Performance: O(1)
  • Arguments: {string or number} value
  • Description: Converts string or numeric value to decimal value

####Example

j.toDec('1.234');

// 1.234

j.toDec(0xA);

// 11

j.toDec(010);

// 8

toValues

  • Performance: O(n)
  • Arguments: {map} valueMap
  • Description: Returns array of values contained in hashmap

####Example

j.toValues({
    1: "Value 1",
    2: "Value 2",
    3: "Value 3",
    4: "Value 4",
});

// [ "Value 1", "Value 2", "Value 3", "Value 4" ]
